titles.title: Recognizing and honoring the 50th anniversary of the founding of AARP.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Mrs. Davis (CA) moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 1464.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/22/2008--Passed House without amendment. Recognizes and commends AARP for 50 years of outstanding service in promoting the lives and retirement security of persons age 50 and older.
